title: Sample, "April", 1960
medium:
Medium: cotton (small samples include linen, rayon, goats hair, mohair, polyester, Fibranne)
Technique: printed on plain weave (one small sample is twill weave)
markings: Manufacturer's paper label attached to bottom right corner of all samples.
description: Multicolored stylized flowers printed on white. Eleven smaller samples in other colorways are attached across the top of the large sample. All samples are serged on four sides.
